title: Mexican Football Club Tigres Now Accepts Bitcoin For Tickets
text: Tigres supporters can purchase match tickets with bitcoin through a partnership between cryptocurrency exchange Bitso and ticketing platform Boletomovil.

title: SFLMaven To Accept Bitcoin As Payment, Add BTC To Balance Sheet
text: Luxury jewelry reseller SFLMaven announced they plan to accept bitcoin as payment and have added BTC as a line item on their balance sheet.

text: BTC was once again trading higher, as bullish momentum extended during today's market session. Bitcoin rose to its highest level in eleven days, breaking resistance of $42,500 in the process. title: Bitcoin And A World Of Rules Without Rulers
text: Bitcoin offers an opportunity for society to move toward systems of clear, easy-to-understand rules instead of our current system of rulers.

title: U.S Treasury Sanctions Russian Bitcoin Miners
text: The Treasury department announced sanctions against companies and individuals who enable fiat payments or infrastructure for bitcoin mining in Russia.

title: Bitcoin, The Monetary Shot Heard ‘Round The World
text: By freezing accounts of everyday citizens, the Canadian government demonstrated the necessity of Bitcoin. Russia is learning the same lesson through U.S. sanctions.

title: Study: Switzerland Has ‘the Most Profitable Bitcoin Traders' Worldwide, While France ‘Is the Best Bitcoin Trading Nation'
text: According to a recent study published by the online investing news and education platform Invezz, Switzerland currently has the most profitable bitcoin traders worldwide. title: Bitcoin Mining Around The World: Norway's Outsized Presence Relative To Its Size
text: What makes this Arctic outpost so attractive to bitcoin miners, considering the country's tiny geographical size and small population?

title: Brazilian Wine Club Now Accepts Bitcoin As Payment On Mobile App
text: Brazilian wine club known as Wine is accepting bitcoin as payment on its mobile application and hopes to extend functionality to desktop and mobile sites.

title: Maryland Porsche Dealer Now Accepts Bitcoin Payments
text: BitPay announced that a Porsche dealer in the Baltimore region is now accepting bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as payment for its vehicles.

title: Russia's Tax Authority: Let Bitcoin, Crypto Be Used In Foreign Trade
text: Russia's Federal Tax Service proposed a change to the “On Digital Currency” legislation allowing entities to accept bitcoin as payment in foreign trade.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: ETH Breaks Resistance to Hit 9-Day High
text: Bitcoin and ETH both rose to nine-day highs on Wednesday, as bulls continued to push prices higher following yesterday's rebound. title: Australia's First Spot Bitcoin ETF To Launch Next Week
text: 21Shares is set to become the first issuer to launch a spot bitcoin ETF in Australia after Cosmos announced its de-facto fund of funds.

title: The Rising Cost Of Energy Impacts Bitcoin Mining Profitability
text: The relationship between energy prices, hash rate, difficulty and the bitcoin price will be extremely important as the price of energy rises.

title: Bitcoin Continues To Flow Out Of Exchanges
text: Bitcoin is quickly leaving exchanges at a rate not seen in years, with almost 80,000 bitcoin being moved off platforms over the last 30 days.

title: Bitcoin Is A Movement For Financial Freedom. Cryptocurrency Is Not
text: Bitcoin as a peer-to-peer financial system and its ideology of financial freedom make a stronger case than the claims of other cryptocurrencies.

title: Bitcoin Is The Modern Monetary Defense Protocol
text: Bitcoin is a contender to replace inferior monetary defensive protocols in order to maximize the protection of individual rights.

title: Bitcoin's Promise For The Fourth Industrial Revolution
text: The evolution of finance that Bitcoin represents will bring impacts comparable to the Industrial Revolution.

title: Bitcoin Is Venice: A Capital Renaissance
text: Bitcoin is the next advancement in the governance of money, an advancement set to spark a new Renaissance.

title: Australia to List Bitcoin ETF After 4 Clearinghouse Participants Commit to Meet Stringent Margin Terms
text: Australia is set to get its first bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) after a report suggested the country's clearinghouse, ASX Clear, confirmed that four market participants agreed to meet its stringent margin requirements. title: IMF Publishes Global Financial Stability Report Discussing Bitcoin
text: The International Monetary Fund published a report detailing how Bitcoin disrupts the world order, enables sovereignty amid sanctions, and demands regulatory action.

title: Silvergate Bank Saw Over $14 Billion in Bitcoin, Crypto Deposited In Q1 2022
text: Silvergate saw customers deposit an average of $14.7 billion worth of bitcoin and cryptocurrency to the firm's platform during the first quarter of this year.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Back Above $41,000 as Crypto Bulls Return
text: Following recent losses, BTC rallied on Tuesday, as bulls appeared to have returned to cryptocurrency markets. title: First Bitcoin ETF On Australia's ASX To List Next Week: Report
text: The Australian fund would invest in shares of Canada's first bitcoin spot ETF, launched by Purpose Investments in early 2021.

title: In The War Of Ideas, Bitcoin Is Our Strongest Weapon
text: In a world of collective identitarian movements, Bitcoin is perhaps the clearest embodiment of the liberal ideal of individual sovereignty.

title: Microbt Reveals Latest Bitcoin Mining Rigs — Machines Produce up to 126 TH/s With Custom 5nm Chip Design
text: Following Bitmain's product introduction of two new application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) bitcoin mining rigs, the mining devices manufacturer Microbt has announced the launch of two new miners as well. title: Allianz Chief Economic Advisor Predicts Bitcoin Going Higher Amid Inflation
text: Mohamed El-Erian, Chief Economic Advisor for Allianz, took an interview with CNBC to discuss the rising price of bitcoin, inflation rates, and possible recession.

title: Thousands At Bitcoin 2022 Call For Separation Of Money From State
